projects.title: Kuwait Finance House
projects.description: Kuwait Finance House (KFH) is considered a pioneer in the Islamic banking phenomenon. I worked on the UI and its functionalities in React and TypeScript. Version Control using Git and Unit testing.

projects.title: D-Tag (Hungary)
projects.description: D-TAG solutions provide insights in the clearest, most efficient way so you can use this knowledge to your advantage. I build web portal from stratch using HTML,CSS,Boostrap and Material UI. From making the UI to the end functionality in Reactjs, I worked on this project from Stratch.

projects.title: Artilytics
projects.description: At Artilytics we transform complex data into actionable insights to help brands take their customer experience to the next level with our one-of-a-kind customer data platform- arti. Arti helps organizations to predict their trends and take a proactive approach. Our artificial intelligence and machine learning capabilities enable you to get the right insights at the right time to quickly and easily boost your performance and grow your revenue.
